sentences.en: A freehold estate is an interest in land that is of uncertain duration.
sentences.cn: 完全保有地产权是一种不定期的土地权益.

sentences.en: A freehold property situates in the borough of Richmond.
sentences.cn: 位于里士满行政区的完全保有房产.

sentences.en: Freehold land given in a will is a devise.
sentences.cn: 若在遗嘱中将完全保有的地产赠给某人,就是不动产遗赠.

sentences.en: No depreciation is provided on freehold land.
sentences.cn: 并无就永久土地作出折旧拨备.

sentences.en: The property register will also say whether the property is freehold or leasehold.
sentences.cn: 房产注册簿上也会说明房产是终身保有的还是租借的。
这处地产将以终身保有的形式购得.

sentences.en: There are two main types of freehold estates: estates on fee simple and life estates.
sentences.cn: 它有两种主要类型: 无条件继承的地产和终身地产.

sentences.en: They bought the freehold of their house.
sentences.cn: 他们买下了房子的自由保有权。

words.tran_cn: 自由地；免费地；大量地；慷慨地；直率地
世袭地产保有人；保有不动产权者
使自由；解放（free的过去分词）

trans.tran_en: when you completely own a building or piece of land for an unlimited time
